channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What if they’re right?
item.description: We spend a lot of time in our own heads, certain that our path and our method make sense. We often become more certain in the face of criticism or eve...

item.title: You’ve already failed
item.description: No project is going to exactly match every hope you have for it. And even before you ship the work, you’ve already succeeded. No project is totally wo...

item.title: The problem with shock design
item.description: If attention is what you seek and attention is what you measure, it’s likely you’ll create drama. And drama is inherently short-lived. The managing di...

item.title: ‘The Thing: Remastered’ Delivers Arctic Insanity And Retro Jank
item.description: Resurrecting old games is great for preservation, as well as introducing new generations to the classics, but it's not all sunshine and rainbows.

item.title: WHO Provides Update About Disease X In Democratic Republic Of The Congo
item.description: The WHO released more information about the outbreak of Disease X in the DRC. Mainly affected children, the cause remains unknown.

item.title: Bitcoin’s Trillion-Dollar Comeback: The Market Shift You Can't Ignore
item.description: The cryptocurrency landscape in 2025 has been dramatically reshaped by Trump's unexpected endorsement and surging Bitcoin prices nearing $100,000.

item.title: Who owns your words?
item.description: There are many ways to ask and answer this question. Authorship used to be rare, but now, all of us write something. If you’re putting your words on a...

item.title: Elites (vs. elitism)
item.description: Tom Brady is an elite athlete. Few have even approached the stats he had playing football. And Catherine Walker, NSTA Science Teacher of the Year, is ...

item.title: Retired UFC Legend Shuts Down Calls For Him To Return To The Octagon
item.description: Despite Alexandre Pantoja's callout, former UFC Men’s flyweight champion Demetrious Johnson is retired, and he plans to keep it that way.

item.title: Tecno Teases Dual-Periscope Zoom Lens For Upcoming Phone
item.description: Along with the new lens, the Chinese tech company also teased a new image processing pipeline and a fast shutter camera for action shots.
